results.name: The legend of Zelda: Retro Wild (Waty)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.

results.name: Aaron's Quest IV: While Moses Was Away
The Light in the Redwood Forest
The Time My Owner Got Raided By Eldritch Gods!
